org.cove.jade.primitives
Class RimParticle

    java.lang.Object
    org.cove.jade.primitives.RimParticle
public class RimParticle
extends java.lang.Object

Class implementing a rim particle. Do not instantiate this by itself, it is used by the Wheel primitive.

Constructor Detail

RimParticle

    public RimParticle(double r,
    double mt)
The RimParticle is really just a second component of the wheel model. The rim particle is simulated in a coordsystem relative to the wheel's center, not in worldspace
